title: NOW LEASING – Gorgeous 2 Bedroom Apt at The Legends at Berry!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Deeply Affordable Apartments At Almost $550 Less Than Nearby Communities!', 'HURRY – our new rent-restricted apartments are going fast!', 'Submit your application paperwork quickly and easily today to reserve your brand-new home!', 'The Legends at Berry will set the new benchmark for quality and affordability in St Paul, MN.', 'Our BRAND-NEW community will offer gorgeous & spacious 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes.', 'Conveniently located near numerous dining, shopping & entertainment options, The Legends at Berry’s location makes it the perfect place to call home.', 'This 62+ independent living, affordable apartment community features a community clubhouse, beautiful outdoor courtyard with a pergola, grilling & picnic area, on-site fitness center, beauty salon, and a cards & crafts room.', 'Furthermore, our in-home amenities can’t be beat, which include 9’ foot ceilings, open & spacious floor plans, quartz counter tops and energy-efficient appliances, just to name a few.', 'The Legends at Berry residents truly get the best of both worlds.', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Open & Spacious Floor Plans', '- Clubroom', '- 9-Foot Ceilings Throughout', '- Under Mounted Kitchen Sink', '- Close to Public Transportation', 'We are a pet-friendly community.', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'The Legends at Berry is a 62+ community and participates in an affordable housing program.', 'At lease one household member must be 62 years or older (+ any/all additional household members must be 18 years or older).', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,380 | 5 Occupants: $76,020 | 6', 'Occupants: $81,660.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', 'The Legends at Berry 62+ Apartments', '777 Berry Street', 'St. Paul, MN, 55114', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'rNdOkQQ2jHQ']
